agent_utterance: Tonight’s quick, doable plan (4 steps): 1) Drink 1 cup of cold water. 2) Have a small protein snack (e.g., Greek yogurt with berries). 3) Do 2 minutes of urge-surf breathing (box breathing: inhale 4, hold 4, exhale 4, hold 4). 4) Do a 60-second micro-log: write one sentence about what triggered the urge and the action you chose. If needed, you can add a brief 5-minute indoor stretch instead of grazing. Goal: complete steps 1–4 tonight and log a brief note before bed.
